verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu which came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim. against the Gentiles

לְמִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> le-mitz-Ra-yim, Against Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning חֵ֨יל <S%H2428><s%> cheil against the army פַּרְעֹ֤ה par-'Oh נְכוֹ֙ <S%H6549><s%> ne-Cho of Pharaohnecho מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- which was by the river פְּרָ֖ת <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat Euphrates בְּכַרְכְּמִ֑שׁ <S%H3751><s%> be-char-ke-Mish; in Carchemish אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הִכָּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah, smote נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar which Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year הָֽרְבִיעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'It, in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> li-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

עִרְכ֤וּ <S%H6186><s%> 'ir-Chu Order מָגֵן֙ <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen ye the buckler וְצִנָּ֔ה <S%H6793><s%> ve-tzin-Nah, and shield וּגְשׁ֖וּ <S%H5066><s%> u-ge-Shu and draw near לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah. to battle

אִסְר֣וּ <S%H631><s%> 'is-Ru Harness הַסּוּסִ֗ים <S%H5483><s%> has-su-Sim, the horses וַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> va-'a-Lu and get up הַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> hap-Pa-ra-Shim, ye horsemen וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> ve-hit-yatz-tze-Vu and stand forth בְּכ֥וֹבָעִ֑ים <S%H3553><s%> be-Choa-'Im; with [your] helmets מִרְקוּ֙ <S%H4838><s%> mir-Ku furbish הָֽרְמָחִ֔ים <S%H7420><s%> ha-re-ma-Chim, the spears לִבְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3847><s%> liv-Shu [and] put on הַסִּרְיֹנֹֽת׃ <S%H5630><s%> has-sir-yo-Not. the brigandines

מַדּ֣וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why רָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti, Wherefore have I seen הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah They חַתִּים֮ <S%H2844><s%> chat-Tim them dismayed נְסֹגִ֣ים <S%H5472><s%> ne-so-Gim [and] turned אָחוֹר֒ <S%H268><s%> 'a-chOr back וְגִבּוֹרֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1368><s%> ve-gib-bo-rei-Hem and their mighty יֻכַּ֔תּוּ <S%H3807><s%> yuk-Kat-tu, are beaten down וּמָנ֥וֹס <S%H4498><s%> u-ma-Nos apace נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Na-su and are fled וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Without הִפְנ֑וּ <S%H6437><s%> hif-Nu; and look not back מָג֥וֹר <S%H4032><s%> ma-Gor [for] fear מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv [was] round about נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor יָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> ya-Nus flee away הַקַּ֔ל <S%H7031><s%> hak-Kal, Let not the swift וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Nor יִמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> yim-ma-Let escape הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-Bor; nor the mighty man צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah toward the north עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- the river פְּרָ֔ת <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat, Euphrates כָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> ka-she-Lu they shall stumble וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-Fa-lu. and fall

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh is this כַּיְאֹ֣ר <S%H2975><s%> kay-'Or as a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh; Who [is] this [that] cometh up כַּנְּהָר֕וֹת <S%H5104><s%> kan-ne-ha-Rot the rivers יִֽתְגָּעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H1607><s%> yit-ga-'a-Shu are moved מֵימָֽיו׃ <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mav. whose waters

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egypt כַּיְאֹ֣ר <S%H2975><s%> kay-'Or like a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh, riseth up וְכַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> ve-chan-ne-ha-Rot like the rivers יִתְגֹּ֣עֲשׁוּ <S%H1607><s%> yit-Go-'a-shu are moved מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; and [his] waters וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and he saith אַֽעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-'a-Leh I will go up אֲכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> 'a-chas-seh- [and] will cover אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, the earth אֹבִ֥ידָה <S%H6><s%> 'o-Vi-dah I will destroy עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir the city וְיֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> ve-Yo-she-vei and the inhabitants בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu Come up הַסּוּסִים֙ <S%H5483><s%> has-su-Sim ye horses וְהִתְהֹלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> ve-hit-ho-le-Lu and rage הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ha-Re-chev, ye chariots וְיֵצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ye-tze-'U come forth הַגִּבּוֹרִ֑ים <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim; and let the mighty men כּ֤וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush the Ethiopians וּפוּט֙ <S%H6316><s%> u-Fut and the Libyans תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <S%H8610><s%> to-fe-Sei that handle מָגֵ֔ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen, the shield וְלוּדִ֕ים <S%H3866><s%> ve-lu-Dim and the Lydians תֹּפְשֵׂ֖י <S%H8610><s%> to-fe-Sei that handle דֹּ֥רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> Do-re-chei [and] bend קָֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H7198><s%> Ka-shet. the bow

וְֽהַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ve-hai-Yom For this [is] the day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לַאדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> la-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom a day נְקָמָה֙ <S%H5360><s%> ne-ka-Mah of vengeance לְהִנָּקֵ֣ם <S%H5358><s%> le-hin-na-Kem that he may avenge מִצָּרָ֔יו <S%H6862><s%> mitz-tza-Rav, him of his adversaries וְאָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-che-Lah shall devour חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> che-rev and the sword וְשָׂ֣בְעָ֔ה <S%H7646><s%> ve-Sa-ve-'Ah, and it shall be satiate וְרָוְתָ֖ה <S%H7301><s%> ve-ra-ve-Tah and made drunk מִדָּמָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-da-Mam; with their blood כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for זֶ֠בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach hath a sacrifice לַאדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> la-do-Nai for the Lord יְהוִ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz country צָפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon in the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- by the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat. Euphrates

עֲלִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Li Go up גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad into Gilead וּקְחִ֣י <S%H3947><s%> u-ke-Chi and take צֳרִ֔י <S%H6875><s%> tzo-Ri, balm בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lat O virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לַשָּׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> lash-shaV in vain; הִרְבֵּיתִי hir-bei-ti כהִרְבֵּ֣ית <S%H7235><s%> hir-Beit abundance קרְפֻא֔וֹת <S%H7499><s%> re-fu-'ot, medicines תְּעָלָ֖ה <S%H8585><s%> te-'a-Lah [for] thou shalt not be cured אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

שָׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U have heard גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim The nations קְלוֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H7036><s%> ke-lo-Nech, of thy shame וְצִוְחָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H6682><s%> ve-tziv-cha-Tech and thy cry מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah hath filled הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- one גִבּ֤וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor for the mighty man בְּגִבּוֹר֙ <S%H1368><s%> be-gib-bOr against the mighty כָּשָׁ֔לוּ <S%H3782><s%> ka-Sha-lu, hath stumbled יַחְדָּ֖יו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu [and] they are fallen שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem. both פ Peh

הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, that the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi; the prophet לָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo, should come נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar how Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon לְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> le-hak-Kot [and] smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

הַגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> hag-Gi-du Declare בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim ye in Egypt וְהַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-hash-Mi-'u and publish בְמִגְדּ֔וֹל <S%H4024><s%> ve-mig-Dol, in Migdol וְהַשְׁמִ֥יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-hash-Mi-'u and publish בְנֹ֖ף <S%H5297><s%> ve-Nof in Noph וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <S%H8471><s%> u-ve-tach-pan-Ches; and in Tahpanhes אִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru, say הִתְיַצֵּב֙ <S%H3320><s%> hit-yatz-Tzev ye Stand fast וְהָכֵ֣ן <S%H3559><s%> ve-ha-Chen and prepare לָ֔ךְ Lach, כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> 'a-che-Lah shall devour חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev thee for the sword סְבִיבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vei-cha. round about

מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why נִסְחַ֣ף <S%H5502><s%> nis-Chaf [men] swept away אַבִּירֶ֑יךָ <S%H47><s%> 'ab-bi-Rei-cha; Why are thy valiant לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not עָמַ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mad, ;they stood כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not because the LORD הֲדָפֽוֹ׃ <S%H1920><s%> ha-da-Fo. did drive

הִרְבָּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bah He made many כּוֹשֵׁ֑ל <S%H3782><s%> ko-Shel; to fall גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Indeed נָפַ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> na-Fal fell אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish yea one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, upon another וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and they said ק֣וּמָה׀ <S%H6965><s%> Ku-mah Arise וְנָשֻׁ֣בָה <S%H7725><s%> ve-na-Shu-vah and let us go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against עַמֵּ֗נוּ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-nu, to our own people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- against אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz and to the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔נוּ <S%H4138><s%> mo-lad-Te-nu, of our nativity מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev sword הַיּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3238><s%> hai-yo-Nah. the oppressing

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U They did cry שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there פַּרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh there Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt שָׁא֔וֹן <S%H7588><s%> sha-'on, [is but] a noise הֶעֱבִ֖יר <S%H5674><s%> he-'e-Vir he hath passed הַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> ham-mo-'Ed. the time appointed

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- [As] I live אָ֙נִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-ni I נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the King יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo; whose name כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki Surely כְּתָב֣וֹר <S%H8396><s%> ke-ta-Vor Surely as Tabor בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rim, [is] among the mountains וּכְכַרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> u-che-char-Mel and as Carmel בַּיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> bai-Yam by the sea יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo.
